item.description:
Come and knit with your knit sibs!!! Please remember that this event is for adults only!  For newbies, a lot of our members do not RSVP.  So even though only two people may have responded, we generally have a lot more people show up.  So don't let the RSVP rate discourage you from coming :)

We are going to try going to the cafe at Books a Million, now they they reportedly have the cafe back to normal after the Borders closure.  Let's see how it goes.
item.name: Sunday Afternoon Gathering!!!
